setting.time: 64 AD, mid-morning, sun climbing higher in sky
setting.location: Banks of Tiber River, stone embankment near Roman port
setting.weather: Dissipating river fog revealing landscape, warming morning air

characters.appearance: Ursus the Lygian, giant man in his thirties, massive muscular build, blonde hair and beard, fierce loyal eyes
characters.clothing: Simple barbarian tunic of rough wool, leather arm guards, thick boots, no Roman refinements
characters.position: Standing on stone embankment watching over his princess Lygia's safety
characters.action: Vigilant guardian scanning river approaches, ready to protect Lygia from any threat with superhuman strength

scene.mainElements: Tiber River with fog wisps lifting from surface, stone quay with mooring posts, wooden fishing boat with nets
scene.details: Morning mist revealing distant hills and buildings as it rises, water drops beading on net fibers, wet stone embankment gleaming in sunlight, fish scales glinting in caught net, rope coils on dock, ceramic amphora for water, seagulls circling overhead
scene.background: Roman cityscape becoming visible through clearing fog, aqueduct arches crossing valley, warehouses and granaries along riverbank
scene.atmosphere: Fresh river scent mixing with morning mist, barbarian warrior's protective instincts heightened in Roman territory, fog creating mystery where enemies might hide, fierce loyalty burning in giant's heart

composition.cameraAngle: Eye level from dock looking across river with fog
composition.focus: Fisherman's silhouette emerging from mist with heavy nets
composition.depth: Foreground wet stone dock, middle ground boat and figure in fog, background city emerging from mist

colorPalette.usageNotes: Rich, regal colors with metallic tones

rendering.detailLevel: high in key areas, atmospheric distance
